page.title: 01Streets Influence on Ashcott
page.content: Most of the people who live in Ashcott(Pop:1200) go to Street more than once a week. Most of the people who work in Street either work in the big stores such as Tesco or Gateway or they work in the High Street shops. There were a few people who worked for Clarks. Almost all the people who often went into Street(4 miles away) used their own transport and hardly ever used public{transport.}All the people agreed that Street had better {facilities}than Ashcott. Again, we found all the people used Street's facilities. When asked if they would rather live in Ashcott or Street, most people said that they preferred Ashcott because of it's{friendly, pleasant{community}spirit. The advantages of living in a small village is that everyone feels a mutual friendlyness for others.
